message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000.
Alice, $18,000 is way too high for me. I'm really interested in this product, but my budget is only $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $18,000 is a bit steep for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $14,000.
Alice, I appreciate you coming down on the price, but $14,000 is still a bit higher than I can comfortably afford.  I'm willing to go up to $11,000.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $14,000 is still a bit high for you. I'm willing to compromise further. I'm now offering the product to you for $13,000.
Alice, I really appreciate you working with me. I'm sticking to my budget of $11,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us.  Let's make this deal happen.
I understand that you're sticking to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm now offering the product to you for $12,500.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm going to stick to my offer of $11,000. This is a fair price considering the value of the product to both of us, and I'm confident we can reach an agreement.

I understand that you're firm on your offer, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm now offering the product to you for $12,000. This is the lowest I can go, and I hope we can finally reach an agreement.
